name: MARVEL Superheroes Awesome Quiz
description:
Fine, you've found us, although it was hard to browse amounts of similar apps. Agree! Well, now it's yours...

It's time to tell you about it. It will help you to kill the time before a new signal arrives and you'll rush to save the world...

If you are a newbie this game will introduce you to new superheroes, but if you are a skilled one - you have to prove it!

Actually, stop reading the description... you could already enjoy our creation!
